alert.note: Alert for Adair; Adams; Cass; Ringgold; Taylor; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 8:35AM CDT until June 29 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 AM CDT FOR CASS...WESTERN UNION...ADAMS...WESTERN RINGGOLD...TAYLOR AND WESTERN ADAIR COUNTIES... At 834 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Walnut to Carbon to near Bedford Municipal Airport, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 830am, a 62 mph gust was reported in Montgomery County. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Creston, Atlantic, Greenfield, Corning, Bedford, Lenox, Griswold, Green Valley Lake, Lake Icaria, Anita, Adair, Fontanelle, Lewis, New Market, Orient, Clearfield, Massena, Diagonal, Cumberland and Prescott. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 50 and 81. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Adams; Cass; Ringgold; Taylor; Union
